text: The Valencia Open Invitational was a golf tournament held in 1959 and was part of the PGA-sponsored Caribbean Tour, which began the previous year. It was held at Carabobo Country Club near Valencia, Venezuela, from 5 to 8 February with prize money of US$10,000. Don January led from the start after a first round of 64. Further rounds of 71-71-67 gave him victory by 11 strokes from Ernie Vossler, taking the first prize of US$1,500. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Year!!Player!!Country!!Score!!To par!!Margin of victory!!Runner-up!!Ref |- | 1959 || Don January || || align=center|273 || align=center|−15 || 11 strokes || Ernie Vossler || |} ==References== Category:Golf tournaments in Venezuela
title: Valencia Open Invitational
